spell_tooltip.description: Immolation Aura dispels a magical effect on you when cast.
Taking damage causes you to gain Fury based on the damage dealt.
Vengeful Retreat provides immunity to loss of control effects, and reduces damage taken by 35% until you land.
Remove all snares and vault away. Nearby enemies take 19,793 Physical damage.
Fel Rush gains an additional charge.
Increases maximum Fury by 20.
The healing of Shattered Souls is increased by 10%.
Throw Glaive ricochets to 1 additional target.
Imprisons a demon, beast, or humanoid, incapacitating them for 1 min. Damage may cancel the effect. Limit 1.
You heal for 3% of all Fire damage you deal.
Unleash an eruption of fel energy, dealing 60,398 Chaos damage and stunning all nearby enemies for 2 sec.
Increases the range of Disrupt to 10 yds.
Consume 1 beneficial Magic effect removing it from the target.
Throw Glaive has 2 charges and 10 yard increased range.

Charge to your target and deal 150,787 Fire damage.

Demon Blades has a chance to reset the cooldown of Felblade.

Generates 40 Fury.
Increases the critical strike chance of Immolation Aura by 6%.
Mastery increases your movement speed.

Leech increased by 10%.

Gain an additional 10% leech while Metamorphosis is active.
Immolation Aura increases your armor by 20% and causes melee attackers to suffer 14,347 Fire damage.
Reduces magic damage taken by 5%.
Eye Beam causes you to enter demon form for 5 sec after it finishes dealing damage.
Increases maximum health by 5%.
Increases your mastery by 4.5%.

Summons darkness around you in an 8 yd radius, granting friendly targets a 15% chance to avoid all damage from an attack. Lasts 8 sec.

Chance to avoid damage increased by 100% when not in a raid.
All Sigils activate 1 second faster.
The cooldown of Fel Rush is reduced by 20%.
Reduces the cooldown of Metamorphosis by 60 sec.
Sigil of Flame deals 70% increased damage and generates 2 additional Fury per target hit.
Eye Beam summons an allied Vengeance Demon Hunter who casts Fel Devastation, dealing 289,906 Fire damage over 2 sec. Dealing damage heals you for up to 21,106 health.

Charge to your target, striking them for 1.3 million Chaos damage, rooting them in place for 1.5 sec and inflicting 936,019 Chaos damage over 6 sec to up to 5 enemies in your path. 

The pursuit invigorates your soul, healing you for 10% of the damage you deal to your Hunt target for 20 sec.

Blasts all enemies in front of you, for up to 1.6 million Chaos damage over 1.8 sec. Deals reduced damage beyond 5 targets.

When Eye Beam finishes fully channeling, your Haste is increased by an additional 10% for 10 sec.
The chance that Chaos Strike will refund 20 Fury is increased by 30% of your critical strike chance.
Your auto attacks deal an additional 22,818 Shadow damage and generate 7-12 Fury.
Immolation Aura generates an additional 40 Fury over 10 sec.
Blade Dance deals 649,264 Chaos damage to the first target struck.
Throw Glaive deals 60% increased damage, reduced by 30% for each previous enemy hit.

Blur now reduces damage taken by an additional 10%.

Additionally, you automatically trigger Blur with 50% reduced cooldown and duration when you fall below 35% health. This effect can only occur when Blur is not on cooldown.
You deflect incoming attacks while Blade Dancing, absorbing damage up to 15% of your maximum health.

Damaging an enemy before they damage you increases your critical strike chance by 10% for 5 sec.

Vengeful Retreat refreshes your potential to trigger this effect on any enemies you are in combat with.
When you activate Metamorphosis, the cooldowns of Blade Dance and Eye Beam are immediately reset.
Throw Glaive now costs 25 Fury and throws a second glaive at the target.
The final slash of Blade Dance inflicts an additional 157,942 Chaos damage over 4 sec.
Vengeful Retreat has a 5 sec reduced cooldown and generates 80 Fury over 10 sec.
The final slash of Blade Dance deals an additional 50% damage.
Immolation Aura's damage increases by 10% each time it deals damage.
The Hunt and Vengeful Retreat increase your damage by 5% for 20 sec.

Chaos Nova, Eye Beam, and Immolation Aura gain bonuses when striking 1 target.

 Chaos Nova:
Stun duration increased by 2 sec.

 Eye Beam:
Deals 30% increased damage.

 Immolation Aura:
Always critically strikes.
When Eye Beam finishes fully channeling, your Haste is increased by an additional 10% for 10 sec.
Enemies hit by Chaos Strike or Throw Glaive take 15% increased damage from Chaos Strike and Throw Glaive for 15 sec.

Demon Blades and Throw Glaive leave open wounds on your enemies, dealing 161,123 Chaos damage over 15 sec and increasing damage taken from your Immolation Aura by 40%.

May be applied to up to 3 targets.

Entering demon form causes your next Chaos Strike to unleash your inner demon, causing it to crash into your target and deal 467,246 Chaos damage to all nearby enemies. Deals reduced damage beyond 5 targets.

Each time Immolation Aura deals damage, 30% of the damage dealt by up to 3 critical strikes is gathered as Ragefire.

When Immolation Aura expires you explode, dealing all stored Ragefire damage to nearby enemies.
Gain critical strike damage equal to 80% of your critical strike chance.
Activating Eye Beam reduces the cooldown of your next Eye Beam by 5.0 sec, stacking up to 20 sec.
Your Chaos damage has a 7.77% chance to be increased by 17%, occurring up to 3 total times.

Immolation Aura has 1 additional charge, 30% chance to refund a charge when used, and deals Chaos damage instead of Fire.

You can have multiple Immolation Auras active at a time.
Slash all enemies in front of you for 628,301 Chaos damage, and increase the damage your Chaos Strike and Blade Dance deal to them by 80% for 4 sec. Deals reduced damage beyond 8 targets.
Blade Dance automatically triggers Throw Glaive on your primary target for 100% damage and each slash has a 50% chance to Throw Glaive an enemy for 35% damage.

Metamorphosis now also causes Demon Blades to generate 3 additional Fury.

While demon form is active, the first cast of each empowered ability induces a Demonsurge, causing you to explode with Fel energy, dealing 395,770 Fire damage to nearby enemies. Deals reduced damage beyond 8 targets.
Movement speed increased by 1% per 10 Fury.

Demonsurge deals 50% increased damage when it strikes a single target.

Each additional target reduces this bonus by 10%.

5% of all non-Fire damage taken is instead taken as Fire damage over 6 sec.

Fire damage taken reduced by 10%.
Your blades burn with Fel energy, causing your Chaos Strike, Throw Glaive, and auto-attacks to deal an additional 50% damage as Fire over 6 sec.
When you activate Metamorphosis, the cooldowns of your Sigil of Flame and Immolation Aura are immediately reset.
The effects of your demon form persist outside of it in a weakened state, increasing Chaos Strike and Blade Dance damage by 15%, and Haste by 5%.
Maximum Fury increased by 50.
Immolation Aura has 2 yd increased radius and 50% increased critical strike damage bonus.
Agility increased by 8% while not in demon form.

Activating Metamorphosis greatly empowers Eye Beam, Immolation Aura, and Sigil of Flame.

Demonsurge damage is increased by 10% for each time it previously triggered while your demon form is active.
Remove all snares and vault away. Nearby enemies take 19,765 Physical damage.
Fel Rush gains an additional charge.
Increases maximum Fury by 20.
Throw Glaive ricochets to 1 additional target.
Imprisons a demon, beast, or humanoid, incapacitating them for 1 min. Damage may cancel the effect. Limit 1.
Unleash an eruption of fel energy, dealing 59,672 Chaos damage and stunning all nearby enemies for 2 sec.
Increases the range of Disrupt to 10 yds.
Consume 1 beneficial Magic effect removing it from the target.

Blasts all enemies in front of you, for up to 1.6 million Chaos damage over 1.8 sec. Deals reduced damage beyond 5 targets.

When Eye Beam finishes fully channeling, your Haste is increased by an additional 10% for 10 sec.
The chance that Chaos Strike will refund 20 Fury is increased by 30% of your critical strike chance.
Demon's Bite deals 50% more damage and generates 5 to 10 additional Fury.
Chaos Strike damage increased by 10%.
Blade Dance deals 637,124 Chaos damage to the first target struck.
Remove all snares and vault away. Nearby enemies take 19,889 Physical damage.
Fel Rush gains an additional charge.
Increases maximum Fury by 20.
The healing of Shattered Souls is increased by 10%.

Chaos Strike damage increased by 10%.
Blade Dance deals 639,618 Chaos damage to the first target struck.
Magical damage increased by 3%, and Physical damage taken reduced by 5%.

Blur now reduces damage taken by an additional 10%.

Additionally, you automatically trigger Blur with 50% reduced cooldown and duration when you fall below 35% health. This effect can only occur when Blur is not on cooldown.
You deflect incoming attacks while Blade Dancing, absorbing damage up to 15% of your maximum health.

Damaging an enemy before they damage you increases your critical strike chance by 10% for 5 sec.

Vengeful Retreat refreshes your potential to trigger this effect on any enemies you are in combat with.
Increases Versatility by 4% and reduces threat generated by 8%.
When you activate Metamorphosis, the cooldowns of Blade Dance and Eye Beam are immediately reset.
The final slash of Blade Dance inflicts an additional 157,942 Chaos damage over 4 sec.
Vengeful Retreat has a 5 sec reduced cooldown and generates 80 Fury over 10 sec.
Eye Beam deals guaranteed critical strikes.
The final slash of Blade Dance deals an additional 50% damage.
The Hunt and Vengeful Retreat cause your next Fel Rush or Felblade to empower you, increasing damage by 18% for 5 sec.
When Eye Beam finishes fully channeling, your Haste is increased by an additional 10% for 10 sec.
Enemies hit by Chaos Strike or Throw Glaive take 15% increased damage from Chaos Strike and Throw Glaive for 15 sec.
The Hunt and Vengeful Retreat increase the damage of your next Fel Rush or Felblade by 300%. Lasts 12 sec.
Launch two demonic glaives in a whirlwind of energy, causing 665,028 Chaos damage over 3 sec to all nearby enemies. Deals reduced damage beyond 8 targets.

Entering demon form causes your next Chaos Strike to unleash your inner demon, causing it to crash into your target and deal 467,246 Chaos damage to all nearby enemies. Deals reduced damage beyond 5 targets.
Chaos Strike has a 10% chance to trigger a second Chaos Strike.
Gain critical strike damage equal to 80% of your critical strike chance.
Your Chaos damage has a 7.77% chance to be increased by 17%, occurring up to 7 total times.
Slash all enemies in front of you for 629,650 Chaos damage, and increase the damage your Chaos Strike and Blade Dance deal to them by 80% for 4 sec. Deals reduced damage beyond 8 targets.
Blade Dance automatically triggers Throw Glaive on your primary target for 100% damage and each slash has a 50% chance to Throw Glaive an enemy for 35% damage.
Movement speed increased by 1% per 10 Fury.

Demonsurge deals 50% increased damage when it strikes a single target.

Each additional target reduces this bonus by 10%.

5% of all non-Fire damage taken is instead taken as Fire damage over 6 sec.

Fire damage taken reduced by 10%.

When you activate Metamorphosis, the cooldowns of your Sigil of Flame and Immolation Aura are immediately reset.
The effects of your demon form persist outside of it in a weakened state, increasing Chaos Strike and Blade Dance damage by 15%, and Haste by 5%.
Maximum Fury increased by 50.
Sigil of Flame applies Student of Suffering to you, increasing Mastery by 18.0% and granting 5 Fury every 2 sec, for 6 sec.
Agility increased by 8% while not in demon form.

Activating Metamorphosis greatly empowers Eye Beam, Immolation Aura, and Sigil of Flame.

Demonsurge damage is increased by 10% for each time it previously triggered while your demon form is active.
